effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

Legguards of the Destroyer

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Disintegrate damage increased by 6% and Pyre damage increased by 6%.
(4) Set: Eternity Surge and Shattering Star's cooldowns are decreased by 1.0 sec and Eternity Surge now grants Essence Burst.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Rippers of the Destroyer

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 11,136 for 15 sec.
Equip: Your healing and damage periodic spells grant 191 Intellect each time they heal or deal damage. Lasts 15 sec, stacking up to 20 times.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
